title: 05/14/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 05/14/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Doug Gottlieb in for Colin


The effect of the NFL's 17 game regular season games

How serious was Tom Brady's surgery

QB Trey Lance should sit

Reasons why QB Aaron Rodgers will stay in Green Bay


Guest: Christian Fauria
